model_info.name: Illustrious Realism v1.0
model_info.description: CivitAI model deployed via Hugging Face

cloud_storage.instructions: Upload your safetensors file to one of these services and get a direct download URL
options: Google Drive (make shareable and get direct link)
AWS S3 (public bucket with direct URL)
Hugging Face Hub (as a file in a model repo)
